title: Is Alexander Elder a successful trader? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have listened to his audio book tens of times to date. And I have read a lot of posts and reviews on his trading strategy that he is endorsing. But whether he is a successful trader is unbeknown to me. Maybe you should do some more research on his trading strategies and whether he has applied it successfully over the years. Just google his his history. You might just get the information you looking for. Please give me a shout if you get anything interesting.

I came across his name a few months ago and bought his book ‘’Trading for a Living’ He offers some great insights into Stock Trading, and its a book anyone starting out should have on their shelf. As to being a ‘successful trader’ I always ponder why ‘successful traders’ go into the business of training and publishing. A topic Elder writes about in his book.
